Minim Available for Pre-order

31 Aug 2015

In case you missed the Minim Kickstarter, you can pre-order one from Livid Instruments at http://shop.lividinstruments.com/minim/.

To learn more about Minim (it's an iPhone-sized bluetooth MIDI controller for iOS) have a look at their Kickstarter pageÂ or check out the video below.
